summary: The document is an identification form associated with the JFK Assassination System, detailing an investigation into DOD-affiliated personnel, specifically focusing on David Reed Fromer. It includes Fromer's personal details such as his social security number, date of birth, and place of birth. A local agency check in Berkeley, California, found no records on Fromer. The form was submitted by a special agent from the 115th MI Gp (I) and contains information regarding the document's classification, restrictions, and release status.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK Assassination System and relates to an investigation into DOD-affiliated personnel.
It focuses on David Reed Fromer, providing personal details and noting a local agency check in Berkeley, California, found no records on him.
The form was submitted by ERIC E. McKNIGHT of the 115th MI Gp (I) and includes details about the document's classification and release status.
